application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: REAR GARDEN		T1	Lime (Tilia x europa)	Reduce by 2-3m back to previous points. Keep lower growth for screening. Final height = 12m and final spread = 6m.T2	Lime (Tilia x europa)	Reduce by 2-3m back to previous points. Keep lower growth for screening. Final height = 12m and final spread = 6m.T3	Cherry (Prunus spp)	Reduce by 1-2m to contain and rebalance. Final height = 4m and final spread = 2m.		G4	Bay (Laurus nobilis) X2	Reduce height by 50% to encourage lower growth. Final height = 2.5m and final spread = 2m.	T5	Purple Leafed Plum (Prunus cerasifera 'Pissardii')	Reduce by up to 1m back to previous points.Final height = 5m and final spread = 4m.		T6	Purple Leafed Plum (Prunus cerasifera 'Pissardii')	Reduce by up to 1m back to previous points.	Final height = 4m and final spread = 2.5m.	T7	Weeping Silver Birch (Betula pendula 'Tristis')	Reduce any protruding branches or spires to maintain umbrella shape.Final height = 4m and final spread = 6m.		FRONT GARDEN		T9	Crab Apple (Malus sylvestris)	Reduce by up to 1m back to previous points.	Final height = 3m and final spread = 1m.	T10	Magnolia x soulangeana	Reduce by up to 2m back to previous points. Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.
